name: HypeRace
description:
HypeRace is a frantic driving game that uses biofeedback to create a more challenging and immersive experience. The player must avoid the obstacles while keeping her heart rate under control, otherwise the  steering gets harder and the lighting gets lower. This game was developed during the Game Jam Plus 22/23, in October 16h. 

Leave a comment if you want more information about this project.
